title: Build Container Image
description: In this challenge, you will learn how to use the docker build command to build Docker images step-by-step.

verify.name: The target of this step is to build a Docker image that contains a simple 'Hello, World!' application.
verify.hint: Please build the Docker image called hello-world using the docker build command.

steps.title: Building a Docker Image with Dependencies

verify.name: The target of this step is to build a Docker image that contains a Python application that requires the Flask library.
verify.hint: Please build the Docker image called flask-app using the docker build command.

steps.title: Building a Docker Image with Environment Variables

verify.name: The target of this step is to build a Docker image that contains a Python application that uses an environment variable to set the port number.
verify.hint: Please build the Docker image called flask-app-env using the docker build command.

steps.title: Building a Docker Image with Multiple Stages

verify.name: The target of this step is to build a Docker image that contains a Go application that is compiled in a separate stage.
verify.hint: Please build the Docker image called go-app using the docker build command.
